recipesJson.name: Apple Fritter | Developed
recipesJson.author: Developed
recipesJson.description:
This is a collaborative creation by DEVELOPED: Skiddlz, AlfredPudding, Max Savage, Graham, folkart, and guest Jerry. 
This recipe is our representation of a Apple Fritter without using CAP Cinnamon Danish Swirl.  Full Development Notes on DEVELOPED Ep. 6 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w6IA-bWr8tM 

Our weekly episodes will be released at 6:00pm EST every Tuesday, and catch our live shows every Thursday at 6pm EST https://www.youtube.com/c/developedDIY

reviews.text: This is delicious! A smooth, balanced and flavorful apple fritter, and without the baggage of CDS. Absolute genius. Developed has quickly become my favorite mixing show. The expertise of the members, the banter and the collaborative creative process make this show both educational and entertaining. Thank you all for doing the show and sharing this excellent recipe!
